text: @senatemajldr Hold please, Republicans put 1.75 billion  in the Covid-19 bill for a new FBI headquarters but they balk at money for food assistance, rent, unemployment, etc.  Don’t forget about all the elected trump lapdogs that took money from the Cares stimulus ...who said McConnell?
